ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://www.gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/gnutls/v3.8/gnutls-3.8.2.tar.xz
ğŸš echo e765e5016ffa9b9dd243e363a0460d577074444ee2491267db2e96c9c2adef77  gnutls-3.8.2.tar.xz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf gnutls-3.8.2.tar.xz
ğŸš cd gnutls-3.8.2
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/gnutls-3.8.2 --docdir=/opt/package/gnutls-3.8.2/share/doc/gnutls-3.8.2 --disable-static --with-default-trust-store-pkcs11=pkcs11:
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
